title: What's everyone's favourite login screen/music as of right now?
body:
25/11/2015 (latest one is illaoi)

for the login animation definitely Lucian,music probably Braum or Draven

opinions?

replies.body:
Diana's login will always be the best.

Always.

Vi's. I also like the Worlds Collide song, but I'm still waiting for Vi's song on iTunes. 

Because I have a Mac and I don't like downloading things from 3rd parties.
Braum's Login Screen is my favorite
I loved the worlds music for this year

Animation-wise, I loved the Zombie slayer one, such a nice throwback at Grindhouse-esque movies, but the Jungle one was epic as fuck with the smite animation (apparently's it's for LCS 2015 Season).

Music-wise...Mmmh...There are many, but probably around Kinetic, GP's or the Arcade one.
